opinion.court: Supreme Court of the United States
opinion.case_name: Mylan Pharmaceuticals, Inc. v. Thompson, Secretary of Health and Human Services

opinion:
537 U.S. 941

MYLAN PHARMACEUTICALS, INC.
v.
THOMPSON, SECRETARY OF HEALTH AND HUMAN SERVICES, ET AL.

No. 01-1492.

Supreme Court of United States.

October 7, 2002.

1

CERTIORARI TO THE UNITED STATES COURT OF APPEALS FOR THE FEDERAL CIRCUIT.

2

C. A. Fed. Cir. Certiorari denied. JUSTICE O'CONNOR took no part in the consideration or decision of this petition. Reported below: 268 F. 3d 1323.
